\"I had the privilege of being treated by Dr. Shilpi Singh, and I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Her respectful and polite demeanor made me feel comfortable and valued as a patient. Dr. Shilpi understanding nature and willingness to go the extra mile to help and teach are truly remarkable. I am incredibly grateful for her exceptional care, and I highly recommend her services to anyone seeking top-notch medical care. Give it a try, and you'll see for yourself what a wonderful doctor she is!\

review: Dr. Shilpi is too friend and she makes the patient feel that you are talking to your sister. She is good at gynaecological problems. Very helpful in nature. Thanks for your service Dr. Shilpi.

Dr. Shilpi made my journey of becoming a 2nd time mother so smooth and worry free. She was available all the time to answer all our queries and her advise really helped me during my pregnancy. The staff of SCI hospital is exceptionally friendly and competent and they ensured that I am properly informed about my health and care.i would like to thanks Dr shilpi and sci staff.

Dr Shilpi Juneja is a very kind Doctor. She is ********** *** **** ** *** ******, skillful in surgery procedure. My own experience is just too good. We are happy with the result, thanks to her for good care . Her manner of treating the patient  put us at ease and helped us gain confidence. Because of Dr Shilpi, my wife is doing very well. Dr Shilpi Juneja you are truly a remarkable doctor and very professional good at her work.
Dr. Shilpi is an Excellent Doctor , professional in her field with her selfless service.Always amazing treatment. She is an extraordinary woman and talented doctor with golden hands.
